name: BeatSaver Favor-It
description:
Draws attention to tracks from your favorite mappers with a glowy, pulsy lighting effect when browsing BeatSaver. Very low CPU usage, while still animating smoothly.
Current version:  v1.0

Please read the instructions before posting questions.
additional_info:
Important: Because you need to edit this style manually, updating it like will wipe out everything you enter. To avoid accidentally nuking your entries, export this style, then reimport it with a new name and edit that version. Leave the one installed from UserStyles, update it like you would other styles, and check the version number. If there's an update, you can just copy-paste the corresponding sections marked in the code. Quick instructions: 1) Find a mapper (user) you like on BeatSaver. 2) Click their name to see all maps by them. 3) Copy their ID number from the URL. 4) Replace "ZZZZZZZZZZZZ" in one of the lines in the code with that number. (bennydabeast is in there as an example) 5) Save If you run out of ZZZZZZZZZZZZ lines, you can copy-paste as many as you want. Just make sure each line ends with a comma ( , ), except the last entry, which ends in a curly bracket ( { ). Explanation: I figured it would be easier for users to replace a single string, rather than copy paste lines of code. If you're comfortable with that, feel free to delete the Z lines. The matched part of the URL is a number, so Z entries are never matched. Works with my complete BeatSaver redesign styles:
  • BeatSaver - Compact Dark Wide
  • BeatSaver - Compact Dark Square
  • BeatSaver - Compact Dark List
  • BeatSaver - Compact Dark Tall
v1.0 - Initial release
